text: Marcus Thorbj√∂rn Ericsson (; born 2 September 1990) is a Swedish racing driver. He competed in the NTT IndyCar Series with Chip Ganassi Racing driving the No. 8 Honda. Ericsson competed in Formula One between 2014 and 2018. He won the 2022 Indianapolis 500. He was born in Kumla, Sweden. ==References== Category:1990 births Category:Living people Category:Formula One drivers Category:Swedish racecar drivers
title: Marcus Ericsson
